actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Export Administration Act of 1969 in order to subject agricultural export agreements to congressional review.

summary.text: Subjects agricultural export agreements to congressional review by allowing such agreements to become effective under the Export Administration Act of 1969 only if not disapproved within 90 days of submission to Congress by either House of Congress.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Export Administration Act of 1969 in order to subject agricultural export agreements to congressional review.
